Package bcu.cmp5332.librarysystem.gui

Class LoanHistoryView

java.lang.Object
bcu.cmp5332.librarysystem.gui.LoanHistoryView
public class LoanHistoryView extends Object
This class is responsible for displaying the loan history in a graphical interface. It creates a table view for loan information
